casebody.data:
WAKE CARES, INC., et al
v.
BOE, et al. No. 230P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 22, 2008. Ann Majestic, Raleigh, for Wake Co. BOE. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of May 2008 by Plaintiffs for Temporary Stay: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 22nd day of May 2008." MARTIN, J., recused.
